billingContent1: Control the invoicing of every sale quickly and easily, with all the necessary information such as price, tax, cashier information, date, etc.
billingContent2: Handy Bill allows you to customize your offers, prices, products, and logo, giving a unique touch to all your sales in each invoice.
billingContent3: View reports with filters by a cashier, product, customer, or any customized filter you want.
inventoryContent1: Keep your inventory updated, controlling the input and output of each product in real-time, and knowing the available stock and out-of-stock efficiently with automatic notifications.
inventoryContent2: You can create as many products as you want, with Handy Bill you can sell clothes, household products, handicrafts, or vegetables, in short, any product.
inventoryContent3: In addition, access intelligent reports about your sales and inventory to be always on top of your business.
